channel.title: CVE Feed for Schneider Electric -- SpaceLogic C-Bus Home Controller
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Schneider Electric -- SpaceLogic C-Bus Home Controller

item.title: CVE-2022-34753|2024-08-03T09:22:09.210Z -- schneider%20electric -- spacelogic%20c-bus%20home%20controller
item.description: A CWE-78: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an OS Command ('OS Command Injection') vulnerability exists that could cause remote root exploit when the command is compromised. Affected Products: SpaceLogic C-Bus Home Controller (5200WHC2), formerly known as C-Bus Wiser Homer Controller MK2 (V1.31.460 and prior)
